Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its true value, we are offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and exclusivity this product offers. We are confident that you will find this investment to be highly beneficial. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
